tweets.author: ぱペコ＠3D販売
tweets.text:
─── ✦ Work Report ✦ ───

This time, I was in charge of the 3D production for the ReGLOSS 1st Live Flashpoint costumes!

▼ Archive is here
https://spwn.jp/events/evt_25121601-jpregloss1st…

© COVER
#ReGLOSS #ReGLOSS_1stLive #hololive

thread_replies.author: Plaid
thread_replies.text: Stay ahead of every threat. With real-time intelligence from Plaid Protect, you can detect risk earlier and act faster—at every step of the customer journey.

thread_replies.author: 儒烏風亭らでんReGLOSS
thread_replies.text:
#ReGLOSS_1stLive  
Thank you so much for the ReGLOSS live!!!  

With the support of so many people, we were able to hold our dream in-person live  
ReGLOSS's journey will continue from here on out too!! Please keep supporting us all the way to the ends of the earth.  

May we

thread_replies.author: 音乃瀬奏ReGLOSS
thread_replies.text:
#ReGLOSS_1stLive

Thank you so much!

It was the most fun ever!!! (Really, really!!!)

Seeing everyone's smiles gave me so much energy, thank you so much... 

I still want to keep singing and dancing!!
I'm overflowing with motivation!!!
From now on, ReGLOSS is going to keep

thread_replies.author: 一条莉々華ReGLOSS
thread_replies.text:
Thanks to all of your tremendous support,  
I was able to stand on a dreamlike stage!  

Receiving everyone's voices directly  
makes me the happiest ever.  
The excitement still hasn't died down yet  

The flusters, the uchiwa, the penlights,  
the happi coats, the pain

thread_replies.author: りる♡
thread_replies.text:
最高の宝物が出来たよ  
ずっとずっとらでんちゃんのことが大好きだよ(ˆ╷ ̫╷ˆ)

thread_replies.author: FTMO.com
thread_replies.text: 10 Years. Many Trading Stories. Start writing yours today!

thread_replies.author: ｙ
thread_replies.text: らでんちゃんライブお疲れ様でした！最高のライブでした！これからも、もっともっと最高の景色を見せてください、宝物をたくさん増やしていこう

thread_replies.author: とも・茶屋亭路歩@ばみりまん
thread_replies.text: こちらこそ、たくさんの宝物をくれてありがとう！！　最高のライブでした！！

thread_replies.author: はんちょー
thread_replies.text: 宝物が一つ増えました！らでんちゃん最高のLIVEをありがとうー！セカンドライブ約束ですよ！？

Thank you for the time that will become my greatest treasure!
I'm so glad I met Raden-chan, and I'm so glad I met ReGLOSS, and I'm spending happy times!
I love Raden-chan so muchーー！！

thread_replies.author: しゆう
thread_replies.text:
ライブおつらでんでした！
おかげで永遠の宝物ができたよ〜
最高の時間をありがとう、

thread_replies.author: ジンギスカンリリィフライパン
thread_replies.text:
らでんちゃん、ライブお疲れ様！
最果てでも！その先だってご一緒します！276億年の果てでも！どこまでも！

thread_replies.author: アダム /
thread_replies.text:
ReGLOSS 1stライブ最っ高でした!!
有明アリーナという素敵なステージで歌って踊るみんなは眩しいほど輝いていてカッコよくて可愛くて､ずっと目が離せませんでした!!
このライブを通してみんなのことがもっともっーっと大好きになりました!!
最高の時間をありがとう!!

thread_replies.author: もっちゃん
thread_replies.text:
らでんちゃん、歌もダンスもお話も全部最高だったよ！
落噺の語りかけるようなところがめちゃくちゃ心に響いて感動した
らでんちゃん含むReGLOSS5人は私の人生の1部で既に宝物だよ
